Thermistor library version 1.0
Copyright (C) 2007, 2013 - SoftQuadrat GmbH, Germany

Calculate A/D lookup table for NTC thermistor / resistor voltage divider network
using temperature-resstance data points from a file for the thermistor as input.
Usage: ./ttor [-s -40 -e 150 [-s AD_STEP (default=32)] -v 1 filename
 v = 0, 1,2
, 77	//-20	0
, 82	//-19	1
, 87	//-18	2
, 92	//-17	3
, 97	//-16	4
, 103	//-15	5
, 109	//-14	6
, 115	//-13	7
, 122	//-12	8
, 129	//-11	9
, 136	//-10	10
, 144	//-9	11
